review: I do like this device a lot! I gave 4 stars rather than 5 because there is definitely room for improvements- The kind where you see that a good product could have been great.  The lack of VUDU deserves a deduction all by itself. I have to use flixster to access my UV library and I definitely do not prefer flixster. I do understand this is an Amazon product but it seems like it was made to be totally biased making the Amazon prime features outshine others such as Netflix and Hulu- I paid for the device - so utilize the greatness of this box and make the key features work with all the apps. Why not be able to use voice within an app? I was going to buy a couple more units but due to the room for improvement- I'm guessing Roku will come out with something to compete and not have the bias. So I'm going to wait awhile and see.
author: Deb
